Steam (ST): "Take care. ...In case the worst happens, here is my talisman. ...The treaty of the alliance won't protect you right now. That Mammon is a bit of a quick trigger. ...And...she may still {i:bear a grudge}. Be careful."
Umineko Project (UP): "Take care. ......In preparation for the worst, use my talisman. ......You are not protected by the treaty of the alliance now. That Mammon can be a little aggressive at times. ...She {i:may still bear a grudge}. Be careful."
PC Japanese (JP): 「しっかりね。……いざという時に備えて、私の護符を。……今の君は同盟の条約に守られてない。マモンは少し喧嘩っ早いところがある子。…あるいは{i:まだ恨んでるかも}。注意して。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「しっかりね。……いざという時に備えて、私の護符を。……今の君は同盟の条約に守られてない。マモンは少し喧嘩っ早いところがある子。…あるいは{i:まだ恨んでるかも}。注意して」
Russian (RU): "Будь осторожна. ......На случай, если всё пойдёт не так, вот тебе мой талисман. ......На тебя сейчас не распространяется защита альянса. А Мамона — девушка склочная. ...Вдобавок, она {i:всё ещё может держать обиду}. Береги себя."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Tome cuidado. ......Para se preparar para o pior, use meu talismã. ......Você não está protegida pelo tratado da aliança agora. A Mammon pode ser um pouco agressiva às vezes. ...Ela {i:ainda pode estar com ressentimentos}. Tome cuidado."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「好好幹。……以防萬一，去把我的護符拿出來。……現在的你不受同盟條約保護。馬蒙是個稍微有點暴脾氣，說動手就動手的孩子。…也許她還在{i:懷恨在心}。小心點。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「好好干。……以防万一，去把我的护符拿出来。……现在的你不受同盟条约保护。马蒙是个稍微有点暴脾气，说动手就动手的孩子。…也许她还在{i:怀恨在心}。小心点。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sii prudente. ... Per prepararsi al peggio, qui c'è il mio talismano. ... Tu non sei protetta dall'alleanza ora. Quella Mammon è una ragazza attaccabrighe. ... E, lei potrebbe serbare rancore. Sta attenta."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Yes. ...I'll wear it."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah. ...I think I'll wear it."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん。…身に着けることにする。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん。…身に着けることにする」
Russian (RU): "Да. ...Я надену его."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. ...Acho que vou usá‐la."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。…我去把它戴身上。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=CHT]
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì. ... Lo indosserò."

Steam (ST): The Seven Stakes of Purgatory, as furniture used to make sacrifices for a ceremony, were treated as beings inferior even to weapons.
Umineko Project (UP): The Seven Stakes of Purgatory, as furniture for sacrificial rituals, are treated as beings inferior even to weapons.
PC Japanese (JP): 煉獄の七杭は、生贄の儀式用の家具で、武具よりは劣る存在とされている。
Russian (RU): Семь кинжалов чистилища, являющиеся мебелью для ритуалов жертвоприношения, воспринимали как создания, стоящих даже ниже, чем оружие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As Sete Estacas do Purgatório, como mobílias para rituais de sacrifício, são tratadas como existências inferiores até mesmo a armas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 煉獄七樁是用於獻祭儀式的家具，遜色於武具。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 炼狱七桩是用于献祭仪式的家具，逊色于武具。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): I Sette Pugnali del Purgatorio, come mobili usati per compiere sacrifici, venivano trattati come esseri inferiori alle armi.

Steam (ST): But that was only when compared to other demons. To Humans, furniture is something to be feared.
Umineko Project (UP): But that is only when it comes to demons.{n}To {y:0:Human}{n:0:human}s, even furniture is something to be feared.
PC Japanese (JP): しかしそれは、悪魔たちの間での話。ニンゲンにとっては、家具とて恐ろしい存在だ。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): しかしそれは、悪魔たちの間での話。{n}ニンゲンにとっては、家具とて恐ろしい存在だ。
Russian (RU): Но это только с точки зрения демонов.{n}Людям же следует страшиться такой мебели.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas isso é apenas quando se trata de demônios.{n}Para {y:0:Humanos}{n:0:humanos}, mesmo mobílias são algo a serem temidas.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過這是惡魔們之間的事。{n}對人類來說，家具也是恐怖的存在。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过这是恶魔们之间的事。{n}对人类来说，家具也是恐怖的存在。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Ma questo è solo quando si parla di demoni. Per gli umani, i mobili sono qualcosa di cui avere paura.

Steam (ST): I fished through the knapsack again, took out a bracelet charm with a scorpion medal that I'd gotten from Maria onee-chan long ago, and put it on my arm.
Umineko Project (UP): I fished through the knapsack again, took out a bracelet charm with a scorpion medal that I had gotten from Maria onee‐chan long ago, and put it on my arm.
PC Japanese (JP): 私は再びナップザックを漁り、真里亞お姉ちゃんに昔もらった、サソリのメダルのついたブレスレットのお守りを取り出し、それを腕に付ける。
Russian (RU): Я вновь запустила руку в рюкзак, извлекла браслет‐талисман с медалью скорпиона, который давным‐давно получила от Марии онее‐чан, и надела его на руку.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu procurei na minha mochila novamente, puxando dela um amuleto na forma de bracelete, com uma medalha de escorpião que eu recebi da Maria onee‐chan muito tempo atrás, e o coloquei no meu braço.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我又翻找了下背包，從中取出以前從真里亞姐姐那拿到的，連著塊蠍子徽章的手環，將這護身符套到了手腕上。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我又翻找了下背包，从中取出以前从真里亚姐姐那拿到的，连着块蝎子徽章的手环，将这护身符套到了手腕上。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Pescai ancora nello zaino, tirando fuori un braccialetto portafortuna con una medaglia a scorpione che avevo ricevuto tempo fa da Maria Onee-chan, e me lo misi sul braccio.

Steam (ST): ...In the past, I hadn't needed something like this. But I need insurance...
Umineko Project (UP): ......I had no need for something like this in the past.{n}But I need insurance...
PC Japanese (JP): ……昔はこんなもの、必要なかった。でも、保険は必要だ…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……昔はこんなもの、必要なかった。{n}でも、保険は必要だ…。
Russian (RU): ......В прошлом я не нуждалась в чём то подобном.{n}Теперь же мне нужна страховка...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Eu não tinha uso para coisas assim no passado.{n}Mas eu preciso de segurança...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……以前並不需要這種東西。{n}不過，現今是得有個保險…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……以前并不需要这种东西。{n}不过，现今是得有个保险…。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In passato, non avevo avuto bisogno di cose simili. Ma avevo bisogno di un'assicurazione...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "......It's okay. That has already been fitted with the required amount of magical defense. As long as you wear that, you'll definitely be fine."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........It's alright. That is still endowed with a sufficient amount of magic defense. As long as you have it on, I'm certain you'll be fine."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………大丈夫。それには、まだ十分な魔法防御が備わってる。それを身に着けている限り、絶対に大丈夫。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………大丈夫。それには、まだ十分な魔法防御が備わってる。それを身に着けている限り、絶対に大丈夫」
Russian (RU): ".........Ладно. Он обладает достаточным уровнем магической защиты. Пока ты его носишь, с тобой ничего не случится."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Está tudo bem. Isto ainda está dotado com uma quantidade suficiente de magia defensiva. Contanto que tenha um consigo, tenho certeza que você vai ficar bem."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………沒事的。這個護符上還具備著足夠的魔法防御力。只要把這個戴在身上，就絕對不會出事。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………没事的。这个护符上还具备着足够的魔法防御力。只要把这个戴在身上，就绝对不会出事。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... È tutto a posto. Quello è già stato riempito con il necessario potere magico difensivo. Finché lo indossi, starai al sicuro."

Steam (ST): Maria onee-chan's magic power, which had been specially put into this charm, had been enough to earn even {f:5:Beatrice}'s admiration.
Umineko Project (UP): Maria onee‐chan's magical power, in particular the power she could put into charms, was enough to earn even {f:5:Beatrice}'s admiration.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞お姉ちゃんの、特にお守りに込められる魔力はベアトリーチェが感嘆するほど。
Russian (RU): Магической силы, вложенной в этот талисман, было достаточно, чтобы вызвать восхищение даже у {f:5:Беатриче}.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O poder mágico da Maria onee‐chan, em particular o poder que ela coloca nos amuletos, era forte o suficiente para ganhar a admiração da {f:5:Beatrice}.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞姐姐所能在護符中注入的魔力大到了，連貝阿朵莉切都會發出感嘆。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚姐姐所能在护符中注入的魔力大到了，连贝阿朵莉切都会发出感叹。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il potere magico di Maria Onee-chan che era stato specialmente riversato in questo portafortuna era sufficiente a guadagnare persino l'ammirazione di Beatrice.

Steam (ST): ...While it may have looked like something cheap to a human who couldn't understand magic, its magical worth was incalculable.
Umineko Project (UP): ......While it would only have looked like something cheap to a human who couldn't understand magic, its magical worth was incalculable.
PC Japanese (JP): ……魔法のことが理解できない人間が見たなら、安っぽいものにしか見えないに違いないそれの魔法的価値は、計り知れない。
Russian (RU): ......Человеку, не обременённому пониманием сути магии, он мог показаться безделушкой, однако его магическая сила не поддавалась исчислению.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Enquanto ele possa parecer algo barato para um humano que não compreende a magia, seu valor mágico é incalculável.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這個讓不理解魔法的人類來看，絕對會視為便宜貨的玩意兒，在魔法上的價值，乃是大到了不可估量的地步。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这个让不理解魔法的人类来看，绝对会视为便宜货的玩意儿，在魔法上的价值，乃是大到了不可估量的地步。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Mentre sarebbe sembrato qualcosa di scarso valore a un umano che non riuscirebbe a comprendere la magia, il suo valore magico era incommensurabile.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "............ Come, arise. Forgive the sin. ...One of the Seven Stakes of Purgatory, Mammon of Greed."
Umineko Project (UP): ".............................. Come, arise. Forgive the sin. ...One of the Seven Stakes of Purgatory. Mammon the Covetous."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………………………。さぁさ、お出でなさい。罪を赦しなさい。…煉獄の七杭が一つ。強欲のマモン。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………………………。さぁさ、お出でなさい。罪を赦しなさい。…煉獄の七杭が一つ。強欲のマモン」
Russian (RU): "........................Приди, предстань. Отпусти же грех. ...Один из семи кинжалов чистилища. Мамона, она же Жадность."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".............................. Venha, apareça. Perdoe o pecado. ...Uma das Sete Estacas do Purgatório, Mammon, da Ganância."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………………………。來——來，出來吧。去赦免罪行吧。…煉獄七樁之一。貪婪的馬蒙。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………………………。来——来，出来吧。去赦免罪行吧。…炼狱七桩之一。贪婪的马蒙。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "...... Vieni, sorgi. Perdona il peccato. ... Uno dei Sette Pugnali del Purgatorio. Mammon dell'Avidità."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): [=UP]
Chinese Traditional (CHT): [=JP]
Chinese Simplified (CN): [=JP]

Steam (ST): I focused my mind. I made the magic-repelling toxin that filled my body zero.
Umineko Project (UP): I concentrated my mind.{n}I made the anti‐magic toxin that filled my body zero.
PC Japanese (JP): 精神を集中する。自分の体内に満たされた反魔力の毒素をゼロにする。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 精神を集中する。{n}自分の体内に満たされた反魔力の毒素をゼロにする。
Russian (RU): Я мысленно сосредоточилась.{n}Затем снизила отрицающий магию токсин в своём теле до нуля.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu foquei minha mente.{n}Reduzindo as toxinas antimagia que preenchiam meu corpo ao zero.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 集中精神。{n}將充滿自身體內的反魔力毒素化解為零。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 集中精神。{n}将充满自身体内的反魔力毒素化解为零。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Concentrai la mia mente. Resi la tossina anti-magia nel mio corpo pari a zero.

Steam (ST): Imagine an untainted, vast space. ...Doubts and common sense all resist magic.
Umineko Project (UP): Imagine a vast, untainted space.{n}......Doubts and common sense all resist magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 穢れなき広大な空間をイメージ。……疑いと常識は全て魔法抵抗。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 穢れなき広大な空間をイメージ。{n}……疑いと常識は全て魔法抵抗。
Russian (RU): Представь не затронутое, обширное пространство.{n}......Сомнение и здравый смысл сопротивляются магии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Imagine um vasto e intocado espaço.{n}......Dúvidas e senso comum resistem à magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 去想像無垢的廣大空間。{n}……疑惑與常識全都會抗拒魔法。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 去想象无垢的广大空间。{n}……疑惑与常识全都会抗拒魔法。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Immagina un incontaminato, enorme spazio. ... Dubbi e senso comune impediscono la magia.

Steam (ST): Make the resistance zero...and erase the burden on the magical power...
Umineko Project (UP): Make the resistance zero, and erase the burden towards magical power......
PC Japanese (JP): 抵抗をゼロにし、魔力に対する負荷を消し去る……。
Russian (RU): Снизь сопротивление до нуля и устрани преграды на пути магии...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Faça dessa resistência zero, apague esse fardo em direção ao poder mágico......
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 將抗拒化為零，消去一切魔力的負擔……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 将抗拒化为零，消去一切魔力的负担……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Rendi la resistenza zero e liberati del peso verso il potere magico...

Steam (ST): ............ ...Inside my head was the image of a vast space.
Umineko Project (UP): ..............................{n}......Inside my head was the image of a vast space.
PC Japanese (JP): …………………………。……頭の中に、広大な空間のイメージが。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): …………………………。{n}……頭の中に、広大な空間のイメージが。
Russian (RU): ........................{n}......В голове моей возник образ обширного пространства.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ..............................{n}......Dentro da minha cabeça estava a imagem de um vasto espaço.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …………………………。{n}……在腦中想像出的廣大空間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …………………………。{n}……在脑中想象出的广大空间。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Nella mia testa c'era l'immagine di un enorme spazio.

Steam (ST): It was a nighttime world where I floated in the air and the neon stars over the ground sparkled.
Umineko Project (UP): It was a nighttime world where I floated in the air and the neon stars on the ground sparkled.
PC Japanese (JP): それは、自分が宙に浮いていて、地上のネオンの星々が輝く夜景の世界。
Russian (RU): Это был мир ночи, где я парила в воздухе над сверкающими неоновыми звёздами на земле.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Era um mundo noturno, onde eu flutuava em meio ao ar e as estrelas de neon reluziam no solo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 是自己浮在半空之中，地上霓虹燈閃爍的夜景世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 是自己浮在半空之中，地上霓虹灯闪烁的夜景世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Era un mondo di notte in cui fluttuavo nell'aria e le stelle al neon sopra il suolo brillavano.

Steam (ST): A world where the stars that should have covered the sky were wiped away by the light from below that covered the ground.
Umineko Project (UP): A world where the stars that should have covered the heavens were drowned out by the light from below, and the stars covered the ground instead.
PC Japanese (JP): 天を覆うべき星は地上の明かりに掻き消され、大地を覆っている世界。
Russian (RU): В этом мире звёздам полагалось усеять небо, однако их затмил свет снизу, ковром покрывающий землю.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um mundo onde as estrelas que deviam cobrir os céus foram apagadas pelas luzes abaixo delas que cobriam o solo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 本應覆蓋天空的星星被地上的燈光所抹消，展開著廣闊大地的世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 本应覆盖天空的星星被地上的灯光所抹消，展开着广阔大地的世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un mondo dove le stelle che avrebbero dovuto coprire il cielo erano spazzate via da una luce che veniva da sotto, che copriva il suolo.

Steam (ST): In the world of a vast night sky with no obstructions, ...I imagined the wind blowing through at will.
Umineko Project (UP): In the world of a vast night sky with no obstructions, ......I imagined the wind blowing through freely.
PC Japanese (JP): 遮られるもののない広大な夜景の世界の空で、……自由に吹き抜ける風をイメージ。
Russian (RU): В мире обширного неба без всяких препятствий... Я представила, как ветер задул по моей воле.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No mundo de um vasto céu noturno sem quaisquer obstruções, ......eu imaginei o vento soprando livremente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後我想像了，在這沒有任何障礙物的廣大夜景世界的空中，……自由翱翔的風。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后我想象了，在这没有任何障碍物的广大夜景世界的空中，……自由翱翔的风。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nel mondo di un vasto cielo notturno con nessun ostacolo... immaginai il vento soffiare a comando.

Steam (ST): At that time, ...in a room where there shouldn't have been any wind, ...the free nighttime wind kicked up a cyclone.
Umineko Project (UP): Just then, ......in that room where no wind could blow, ......the free nighttime wind whirled around.
PC Japanese (JP): その時、……風が吹くはずのない室内に、……自由なる夜景の風が、渦を巻く。
Russian (RU): В тот момент... В комнате, где не должно было быть никакого ветра, задуло дитя циклона — свободный ночной ветер.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): E então, ......naquele quarto onde o vento não podia ventar, ......o livre vento da noite formou um ciclone.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 就在此時，……明明不可能有風的室內，……自由夜景之風捲起了旋渦。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 就在此时，……明明不可能有风的室内，……自由夜景之风卷起了旋涡。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): A quel punto... nella stanza, dove non ci doveva essere alcun vento che soffiava... il libero vento notturno soffiava a creare un tornado.

Steam (ST): The long forgotten sensation raced through my entire body. ......It was the unique feeling of exultation that comes from using magic.
Umineko Project (UP): That long‐forgotten sensation raced through my entire body.{n}............The unique feeling of exultation felt when using magic.
PC Japanese (JP): 久しぶりの感触が、全身を駆け巡る。…………魔法を行使する時の、独特の高揚感。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 久しぶりの感触が、全身を駆け巡る。{n}…………魔法を行使する時の、独特の高揚感。
Russian (RU): Давно забытые ощущения пронзили моё тело от головы до пят.{n}............То было непередаваемое чувство торжества, ощущаемое при использовании магии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Essa sensação há muito tempo esquecida percorreu meu corpo por completo.{n}............O sentimento único de exultação sentido quando se usa magia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 久違的感觸在我的全身奔流。{n}…………這是在使用魔法時才有的，獨特的亢奮感。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 久违的感触在我的全身奔流。{n}…………这是在使用魔法时才有的，独特的亢奋感。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): La sensazione a lungo dimenticata corse lungo tutto il mio corpo. {n}Era la singolare sensazione di esultanza di quando si usava la magia.

Steam (ST): Mammon's stake, which I held out in my hand, gradually began to make me feel a pale light.
Umineko Project (UP): From Mammon's stake, held out in my hand, I gradually began to feel a pale light.
PC Japanese (JP): 私の手にかざされるマモンの杭が、次第に青白い光を感じさせていく。
Russian (RU): Кинжал Мамоны, который я держала в руке, засветился тусклым светом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A partir da estaca de Mammon, repousada na minha mão, eu gradualmente comecei a sentir uma pálida luz.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我感到，在我揚起的手中的馬蒙之樁，漸漸發出了藍白色的光芒。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我感到，在我扬起的手中的马蒙之桩，渐渐发出了蓝白色的光芒。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il pugnale di Mammon, che tenevo in mano, gradualmente cominciò a farmi percepire una flebile luce.

Steam (ST): A twisting cyclone with the stake at the center. ...The hefty stake floated a bit into the air.
Umineko Project (UP): The cyclone gyred around the stake.{n}......The hefty stake floated a bit into the air.
PC Japanese (JP): 杭を中心に渦巻く旋風。……重みのある杭が、わずかに宙に浮く。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 杭を中心に渦巻く旋風。{n}……重みのある杭が、わずかに宙に浮く。
Russian (RU): Кинжал в центре водоворота циклона.{n}......Увесистый кинжал слегка взлетел в воздух.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O ciclone girou em volta da estaca.{n}......A robusta estaca flutuou levemente no ar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 以樁為中心捲起的旋風。{n}……將有點份量的樁，微微托起於空中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 以桩为中心卷起的旋风。{n}……将有点份量的桩，微微托起于空中。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Un tornado turbinante con un pugnale al centro. ... Il robusto pugnale fluttuò un poco nell'aria.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "......Wonderful. ...Looks like the gap in your training hasn't stolen your talent."
Umineko Project (UP): "............Wonderful. ...Looks like the gap in your training hasn't stolen your talent."
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………見事だよ。…ブランクは君から才能を奪わなかったね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………見事だよ。…ブランクは君から才能を奪わなかったね」
Russian (RU): "............Замечательно. ...Похоже, что пробел в твоих тренировках не убавил твоего таланта."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "............Incrível. ...Parece que o intervalo em seu treinamento não tomou de você seu talento."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………漂亮。…空白的時間沒有奪走你的才能。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…………漂亮。…空白的时间没有夺走你的才能。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Incredibile. ... Sembra che il buco nel tuo allenamento non ti abbia tolto il talento."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "...Come, arise. Forgive the sin. ...One of the Seven Stakes of Purgatory, Mammon of Greed. ...Show yourself to me..."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Come, arise. Forgive the sin. ...One of the Seven Stakes of Purgatory, Mammon the Covetous. ......Show yourself to me......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……さぁさお出でなさい。罪を赦しなさい。煉獄の七杭が一つ、強欲のマモン。……その姿を私に見せなさい……。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……さぁさお出でなさい。罪を赦しなさい。煉獄の七杭が一つ、強欲のマモン。……その姿を私に見せなさい……」
Russian (RU): "......Приди, предстань. Отпусти же грех. ...Один из семи кинжалов чистилища, Мамона, она же Жадность. ......Стань передо мной..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Venha, apareça. Perdoe o pecado. ...Uma das Sete Estacas do Purgatório, Mammon, da Ganância. ......Apareça perante mim......"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……來——來，出來吧。去赦免罪行吧。煉獄七樁之一，貪婪的馬蒙。……將你的身形現於我面前……」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……来——来，出来吧。去赦免罪行吧。炼狱七桩之一，贪婪的马蒙。……将你的身形现于我面前……」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Vieni, sorgi. Perdona il peccato. ... Uno dei Sette Pugnali del Purgatorio, Mammon dell'Avidità. ... Mostrati a me..."

Steam (ST): After I raised my hands bit by bit, lifting them higher than my head, as though it was being attracted upwards, Mammon's stake once again floated up high into the air...and gradually began to shake.
Umineko Project (UP): I slowly raised my hand, and as I brought it higher than my head, almost as though it was being sucked upwards by it, the Stake of Mammon likewise floated high up into the air, ......and gradually began to shake.
PC Japanese (JP): 私がかざす手を徐々に高め、頭より高く掲げると、まるでそれに吸い寄せられるように、マモンの杭もまた、宙高く浮かび上がり、……徐々に震え始める。
Russian (RU): Кинжал понемногу подниматься, пока не поднялся выше моей головы, а затем, словно какая‐то сила продолжала тянуть его вверх, кинжал Мамоны поднялся ещё выше... и постепенно начал трястись.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Eu lentamente levantei minha mão, e a ergui mais algo que minha cabeça, quase como se estivesse sendo sugada para cima por ela, a Estaca de Mammon igualmente flutuou no ar, ......e gradualmente começou a tremer.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 隨著我將揚起的那隻手慢慢往上，高舉過頭，簡直就如被我的手吸上去了一般，馬蒙之樁也高高浮上了半空，……漸漸顫抖了起來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 随着我将扬起的那只手慢慢往上，高举过头，简直就如被我的手吸上去了一般，马蒙之桩也高高浮上了半空，……渐渐颤抖了起来。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il pugnale che tenevo si alzò poco a poco, alzandosi più in alto della mia testa, e come se fosse attratto da sopra, il pugnale di Mammon ancora più su nell'aria... e gradualmente cominciò a tremare.

Steam (ST): That shaking began to grow faster, .........and then it burst.
Umineko Project (UP): Its shaking grew faster and faster, .........and then it burst.
PC Japanese (JP): その振るえが次第に早くなり、………弾けた。
Russian (RU): Это сотрясение становилось всё быстрее, а затем словно случился маленький взрыв.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Tremendo cada vez mais rápido, .........e então explodindo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 只見它越顫越快，………飛也似地彈了出去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 只见它越颤越快，………飞也似地弹了出去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quel tremolio cominciò a diventare più veloce... ed esplose.

Steam (ST): With a speed faster than the eye could follow, it flew around, violently rebounding off the walls of the room. ...The terrible sound of it dancing around threatened to make me flinch.
Umineko Project (UP): With a speed faster than the eye could follow, it flew around, violently rebounding off the walls of the room.{n}......The terrible sound of it jumping from place to place bore down upon me, trying to make me flinch.
PC Japanese (JP): 目にも留まらぬ速度で室内の壁を乱反射しながら飛び回る。……跳ね回る凄まじい音が、私を怯ませようと威圧する。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 目にも留まらぬ速度で室内の壁を乱反射しながら飛び回る。{n}……跳ね回る凄まじい音が、私を怯ませようと威圧する。
Russian (RU): И кинжал принялся с неуловимой для человеческого взгляда скоростью носиться по комнате, отскакивая от стен.{n}......От издаваемого при этом неприятного звука мне хотелось поморщиться.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mais rápido do que a visão consegue acompanhar, ela saiu voando, violentamente ricocheteando pelas paredes do quarto.{n}......O terrível som dela pulando de um lugar para o outro me atordoou, fazendo com que eu vacilasse.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 馬蒙之樁以人眼捕捉不到的速度，借助室內的牆壁亂彈亂飛。{n}……意圖以彈來彈去所發出的巨響迫使我害怕。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 马蒙之桩以人眼捕捉不到的速度，借助室内的墙壁乱弹乱飞。{n}……意图以弹来弹去所发出的巨响迫使我害怕。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Con una velocità più veloce di quella che l'occhio era in grado di seguire, volò tutt'intorno, rimbalzando violentemente sulle pareti della stanza. ... Il terribile suono di quello che danzava in giro minacciava di farmi cedere.

Steam (ST): ...However, I must not lose my mental concentration.
Umineko Project (UP): ......But I mustn't lose my mental concentration.
PC Japanese (JP): ……しかし、精神の集中を乱してはならない。
Russian (RU): ......Однако я не должна была терять сосредоточенность мыслей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Mas não perdi minha concentração mental.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……不過，我可不能令集中的精神紊亂。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……不过，我可不能令集中的精神紊乱。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In ogni caso, non devo perdere la mia concentrazione.

Steam (ST): Then, the stake, which had been flying around at an incredible speed, finally stopped and faced me...
Umineko Project (UP): Then, the stake, which had been flying around at an incredible speed, finally restrained itself and faced me.
PC Japanese (JP): そして、ものすごい速度で飛び回っていた杭は、ようやく制止して私と対面してくれた。
Russian (RU): Затем кинжал, мечущийся по комнате с невероятной скоростью, наконец успокоился и повернулся ко мне...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, a estaca, que estava voando ao entorno em uma incrível velocidade, finalmente restringiu‐se e virou‐se para mim.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 接著，疾速亂飛的樁，總算是肯停了下來，與我對面。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 接着，疾速乱飞的桩，总算是肯停了下来，与我对面。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Poi, il pugnale, che era volato tutt'intorno a un'incredibile velocità, finalmente si contenne e si mise di fronte a me...

Steam (ST): ...It was in the air, just a few centimeters away from my forehead, ...and held back by the defensive barrier created by the scorpion charm.
Umineko Project (UP): ......It was in the air, just a few centimeters away from my forehead...held back by the defensive barrier created by the scorpion charm.
PC Japanese (JP): ……私の眉間のほんの数センチ直前の空中で、サソリのお守りによる防御結界に食い止められながら。
Russian (RU): ......Он завис в воздухе в нескольких сантиметрах от моего лба, сдерживаемый защитным барьером, созданным скорпионьим талисманом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Estava no ar, apenas alguns centímetros da minha testa...contida pela barreira defensiva criada pelo amuleto de escorpião
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……她在我眉間幾厘米前的空中，被蠍子護身符所布下的防御結界死死擋住。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……她在我眉间几厘米前的空中，被蝎子护身符所布下的防御结界死死挡住。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Stava nell'aria, giusto a pochi centimetri dalla mia fronte... trattenuto dalla barriera difensiva creata dall'amuleto a scorpione.

Steam (ST): It had tried to break the defensive barrier, eating into it with an incredible power, but Maria onee-chan's barrier wouldn't be broken so easily.
Umineko Project (UP): It was trying to break the defensive barrier, eating into it with incredible power, but Maria onee‐chan's barrier wouldn't be broken so easily.
PC Japanese (JP): 防御結界を破ろうと、ものすごい力で食い込んでくるが、真里亞お姉ちゃんの結界はこんな簡単には破れない。
Russian (RU): Он пытался пересилить защитный барьер, проедая его невероятной мощью, но барьеры Марии онее‐чан легко не давались.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela estava tentando quebrar a barreira defensiva, consumindo‐a com um incrível poder, mas a barreira da Maria onee‐chan não se quebraria facilmente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然她想要突破防御結界，使出吃奶的勁兒往裡鑽，不過真里亞姐姐的結界才不會那麼容易地被鑽破。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然她想要突破防御结界，使出吃奶的劲儿往里钻，不过真里亚姐姐的结界才不会那么容易地被钻破。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Aveva provato a rompere la barriera difensiva, consumandola con un incredibile potere, ma la barriera di Maria Onee-chan non si sarebbe rotta così facilmente.

Steam (ST): "......It's no use, ...I can't break it..."
Umineko Project (UP): "...............No good... I can't bite through it......"
PC Japanese (JP): 「……………無理か…、食い破れない……。」
Russian (RU): "............Вот незадача, не пробивается..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...............Impossível... eu não consigo morder isso......"
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Non va bene... non riesco a romperla..."

Steam (ST): The stake muttered hatefully.
Umineko Project (UP): The stake muttered hatefully.
PC Japanese (JP): 杭が憎々しげに呟く。
Russian (RU): С ненавистью пробормотал кинжал.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A estaca murmurou com ódio.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樁惡狠狠地如此說道。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 桩恶狠狠地如此说道。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Il pugnale mormorò con odio.

Steam (ST): ...It was probably safe to say that the scorpion charm saved me.
Umineko Project (UP): ......You could probably say that I had been saved thanks to the scorpion charm.
PC Japanese (JP): ……サソリのお守りのお陰で助かったと言えるだろう。
Russian (RU): ......Что ж, можно с уверенностью сказать, что обязана скорпионьему талисману спасением.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Você poderia dizer que eu fui salva graças ao amuleto de escorpião.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……我可謂是被蠍子護身符救了一命吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……我可谓是被蝎子护身符救了一命吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Avresti potuto dire che probabilmente ero stata salvata dall'amuleto a scorpione.

Steam (ST): Without that, my attempt at killing time until I got sleepy would've killed my time for all eternity.
Umineko Project (UP): Without that, my way of killing time until I got sleepy would have become a way to kill time for all eternity.
PC Japanese (JP): これがなかったら今頃、眠気が訪れるまでの暇潰しが、永遠の暇潰しに変わるところだった。
Russian (RU): Без него я бы убила не время, а саму себя на веки вечные.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Sem ele, minha forma de matar tempo até pegar no sono teria se transformado uma forma de matar o tempo por toda a eternidade.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 要是沒有它，這會兒睡意來訪前的解悶消遣，就變成永遠的解悶消遣了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 要是没有它，这会儿睡意来访前的解闷消遣，就变成永远的解闷消遣了。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Senza quello, il mio modo di passare il tempo prima di addormentarmi sarebbe diventato un modo per passare il tempo per tutta l'eternità.

Steam (ST): When Mammon's stake realized that it was unable to gouge me, it gave up and grew docile, changing its form from that of a stake into a human.
Umineko Project (UP): When Mammon's stake realized that it was unable to gouge me, it gave up gracefully, and changed its form from that of a stake into that of a person.
PC Japanese (JP): マモンの杭は、私をえぐることが出来ないと悟ると、素直に降参し、杭から人に姿を変えた。
Russian (RU): Когда кинжал Мамоны понял, что ему не под силу пронзить меня, он сдался и стал вялым, сменив облик кинжала на человеческий.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando a estaca de Mammon percebeu que seria incapaz de me goivar, ela desistiu graciosamente, mudando sua forma de estaca para a forma de uma pessoa.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 馬蒙之樁意識到自己沒法鑽進我的身體後，老老實實地選擇投降，從樁變成了人。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 马蒙之桩意识到自己没法钻进我的身体后，老老实实地选择投降，从桩变成了人。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Quando il pugnale di Mammon realizzò che era gli era impossibile trafiggermi, si arrese e divenne docile, cambiando la sua forma da pugnale a umana.

Steam (ST): ...In that same old outfit that I'd never be able to walk around outside in. Although you could say it suited her, in a demonic sort of way.
Umineko Project (UP): In her usual shameless outfit which I would never be seen walking outside in.{n}Although you could say it suited her, in a demonic sort of way.
PC Japanese (JP): 相変わらずの、私じゃとても表を歩けないすごい格好で。悪魔的という意味では、らしくて良いのかもしれないが。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 相変わらずの、私じゃとても表を歩けないすごい格好で。{n}悪魔的という意味では、らしくて良いのかもしれないが。
Russian (RU): Та же самая одежда, в которой я бы ни за какие коврижки не показалась на глаза другим.{n}Однако можно было сказать, что в демоническом смысле этот наряд ей очень шёл.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com suas roupas indecentes de sempre, as quais eu nunca desejaria ser vista andando na rua. Embora você pudesse dizer que combinavam com ela, de uma forma demoníaca.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 依舊是一身換做我就不敢出門的大膽裝束呢。{n}從惡魔的意義上講，也許就該如此吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 依旧是一身换做我就不敢出门的大胆装束呢。{n}从恶魔的意义上讲，也许就该如此吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Nella stessa vecchia uniforme con cui non sarei mai in grado di andare in giro fuori. Sebbene potresti dire che le si addiceva, in un qualche senso demoniaco.

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "......Is that Ange-sama? ......But that magical power's pretty shabby. ...Are you really Ange-sama?"
Umineko Project (UP): ".................Ange‐sama, is that you? ............That's some pretty shabby magical power. ...Are you really Ange‐sama?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………………縁寿さまなの？　…………ずいぶんとみすぼらしい魔力だけど。…本当に縁寿さま？」
Russian (RU): "............Энджи‐сама? ............Но что за убогая магическая сила. ...Это и впрямь вы?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".................Ange‐sama, é você? ............Esse é um poder mágico bem pobre.{n}...Você é mesmo a Ange‐sama?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………………是緣壽小姐嗎？…………好寒磣的魔力呢。…真的是緣壽小姐？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………………是缘寿小姐吗？…………好寒碜的魔力呢。…真的是缘寿小姐？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ange-sama? ... Ma quello è un potere magico piuttosto misero. ... È davvero Ange-sama?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "It's been a long time, Mammon. ...Have you been well?"
Umineko Project (UP): "It's been a long time, Mammon. ......Have you been well?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お久しぶりね、マモン。……元気にしてた？」
Russian (RU): "Давно не виделись, Мамона. ......Как поживаешь?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Já faz algum tempo, Mammon. ......Como tem estado?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「好久不見，馬蒙。……過得可好？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「好久不见，马蒙。……过得可好？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): " È passato un bel po' di tempo, Mammon. ... Come te la sei passata?"

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "...... ...And here I was convinced that furniture that's already fulfilled its function just gets left to rust away in a closet. ...So, what kind of side show is this? You aren't gonna say that you're my owner, are you...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "........................... ...And here I was convinced that furniture which has already fulfilled its function would just be left to rust away in a closet. ......So, what kind of sideshow is this? You aren't going to say that you're my owner, are you, Ange‐sama...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「………………………。…てっきり、もうお役御免の家具は、納戸で朽ち果てるだけだと思ってました。……それで、これはどういう余興で？　まさか、私の所有者が縁寿さまだとでも仰るつもりで…？」
Russian (RU): "...............А я то думала, что отслужившая своё мебель будет брошена ржаветь себе в шкафу. ......Итак, что у нас тут за кино? Уже не собираетесь ли вы, Энджи‐сама, заявить, что вы и есть моя новая хозяйка?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "........................... ...E aqui eu convencida de que mobílias que já cumpriram com sua função deveriam simplesmente serem deixadas para pegar poeira em um armário. ......Então, que tipo de show secundário é esse? Não vai me dizer que você é minha dona, é, Ange‐sama...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………………………。…我還以為，已經沒用處了的家具，肯定要在儲藏室裡待到爛掉呢。……說來，這算哪門子餘興？難道是要說，緣壽小姐成了我的所有者嗎…？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………………………。…我还以为，已经没用处了的家具，肯定要在储藏室里待到烂掉呢。……说来，这算哪门子余兴？难道是要说，缘寿小姐成了我的所有者吗…？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... E io che ero convinta che i mobili che hanno ormai svolto i loro compiti venissero lasciati a marcire in un armadio. ... Allora, che razza di spettacolino è questo? Non starai per dirmi che tu sei la mia padrona, vero, Ange-sama...?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "......Yes. Ange is your master."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "Yes. I thought that as she is now, Ange might just have gotten finished off by you. I lent her a talisman."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah. I thought that as Ange is now, she might just fall to you. I lent her a talisman."

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. Imaginei que da forma como a Ange está agora, ela pereceria perante você. Por isso dei o talismã para ela."

Steam (ST): "......... ...If Lady {f:5:Maria} says Ange-sama is my master, I cannot refuse. ......Ange-sama, please, your orders. If it's me you need, are you going to perform a new ceremony? With new sacrifices...?
Umineko Project (UP): "..................... ......If I am told by Lady {f:5:Maria} that Ange‐sama is my master, I can hardly refuse. .........Ange‐sama, I am yours to command. Given that my assistance is required...is it a new ritual? New sacrifices...?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…………………。……マリア卿に、私の主人が縁寿さまだと言われたんじゃ、断りようもありません。………縁寿さま、何なりとご命令を。私が必要とされるということは、新しい儀式を？　新しい生贄を…？
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…………………。……マリア卿に、私の主人が縁寿さまだと言われたんじゃ、断りようもありません。………縁寿さま、何なりとご命令を。私が必要とされるということは、新しい儀式を？　新しい生贄を…？」

Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "..................... ......Se a Lady {f:5:Maria} disse que a Ange‐sama é minha mestra, não posso refutar. .........Ange‐sama, estou ao seu comando. Se minha assistência é necessária...significa que é um novo ritual? Novos sacrifícios...?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…………………。……既然瑪利亞卿說了我的主人是緣壽小姐，我自然無可推辭。………緣壽小姐，還請您隨便下令。需要我，那就是代表著，要舉行新的儀式？獻上新的活祭…？」

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Se mi dice Lady MARIA che Ange-sama è la mia padrona, non posso rifiutarmi. ... Ange-sama, la prego, i suoi ordini. Sono richiesta per una nuova cerimonia? Un nuovo sacrificio...?

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): Of course, that's only if you're willing to handle me yourself and get your own hands dirty."
Umineko Project (UP): "Of course, that's only if you're willing to handle me yourself and get your own hands dirty."

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「もっとも、私を使いこなし、自らの手を汚す程度の覚悟がおありならの話ですが」

Umineko Project (UP): ".........That role isn't one I'm looking for anymore. .........All you have to do is just talk with me, like you used to."

Steam (ST): ...She accepted her new master because Maria had told her to, but it looked like she hadn't gotten over her discontent at working for Ange, with her frail magical power.
Umineko Project (UP): ......She had accepted Ange as her new master because Maria had told her to, but it looked like she hadn't gotten over her discontent at working for Ange with her frail magical power.
PC Japanese (JP): ……真里亞に言われたので新しい主人と認めたが、魔力の脆弱な縁寿に仕えるのに、まだ不服が抜けないように見えた。
Russian (RU): ......Она приняла её в качестве новой госпожи, поскольку Мария сказала ей это, однако по её виду можно было сказать, что она не смогла пересилить неудовольствие от работы на Энджи с её ничтожной магической силой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Ela havia aceito Ange como seu novo mestre porque Maria havia dito a ela, mas parece que ela não superou seu descontentamento em ter que servir Ange com o fraco poder mágico que ela tinha agora.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……雖然她聽從了真里亞的吩咐，認可了新主人，但看起來，她還在對去聽命於魔力微薄的緣壽心感不服。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……虽然她听从了真里亚的吩咐，认可了新主人，但看起来，她还在对去听命于魔力微薄的缘寿心感不服。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Accettava la sua nuova padrona perché Maria le aveva detto di farlo, ma sembrava non aver accantonato il suo dispiacere di lavorare per Ange con il suo fragile potere magico.

Steam (ST): ...Perhaps she had some other reason for hating Ange, but for now, it seemed that she couldn't disobey, even if she wasn't happy about it.
Umineko Project (UP): Or perhaps she had some other reason for hating Ange, ......but for now, it seemed that she couldn't disobey Ange despite her discontent.
PC Japanese (JP): あるいは、それ以外にも縁寿を嫌う理由があるのかもしれないが、……とりあえず、不服はありながらも縁寿には逆らえないようだった。
Russian (RU): Должно быть, у неё имелись другие причины недолюбливать Энджи, но на данный момент она, судя по всему, не могла выказать неповиновения Энджи, даже если и была недовольна.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ou talvez ela tivesse outra razão para odiar Ange, ......mas agora, parecia que ela não desobedeceria Ange apesar de seu descontentamento.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 或許，還存在著其他討厭緣壽的理由也說不定，……不過，總之，看來馬蒙儘管心存不服，但也沒法反抗緣壽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 或许，还存在着其他讨厌缘寿的理由也说不定，……不过，总之，看来马蒙尽管心存不服，但也没法反抗缘寿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Forse aveva qualche altra ragione per odiare Ange... ma per ora, sembrava non poter disobbedire ad Ange anche se non le andava.

Speaker: Mammon

Umineko Project (UP): ".........So? What should I do?"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………那么。我该去做些什么呢？」

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "I don't know. ......Just do something lively. Like old times."
Umineko Project (UP): "I don't know. .........Just be lively. Like old times."
PC Japanese (JP): 「わからない。………適当に賑やかにしてくれればいいわ。昔みたいに。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「わからない。………適当に賑やかにしてくれればいいわ。昔みたいに」
Russian (RU): "Не знаю. .........Делай что‐нибудь бойкое. Как в старые добрые времена."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu não sei. .........Apenas seja animada. Assim como antigamente."

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「不知道。………随便搞热闹点就行了。就跟以前一样。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non lo so. ... Semplicemente qualcosa di allegro. Come ai vecchi tempi."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Well now. This liveliness you're talking about is probably from when we sisters were all together. It may be difficult by myself. ...Did you forget?"
Umineko Project (UP): "With all due respect, I think this liveliness you speak of is probably the bustle from when we sisters are together. It may be difficult by myself. ......Perhaps it slipped your mind?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「お言葉ですが。多分、縁寿さまが仰る賑やかさとは、私たち姉妹の騒ぎのことだと思います。私ひとりでは難しいかと。……お忘れで？」
Russian (RU): "Ну, знаете. Эта бойкость, о которой вы говорите, возникает только тогда, когда все мы сёстры собираемся вместе. Одной мне будет непросто. ......Вы забыли?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Com todo o respeito, eu acho que essa animação da qual você fala é provavelmente a azáfama de quando nós irmãs estávamos juntas. Pode ser um pouco difícil apenas para mim. ......Talvez tenha esquecido?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「雖然您都已經這麼說了。不過，我覺得緣壽小姐所說的“熱鬧”，指的是我們姐妹一起鬧騰的情景。就我一個，可有點難哦。……您忘了嗎？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「虽然您都已经这么说了。不过，我觉得缘寿小姐所说的“热闹”，指的是我们姐妹一起闹腾的情景。就我一个，可有点难哦。……您忘了吗？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Bene allora. Quest'allegria di cui parla probabilmente è la confusione che c'è quando noi sorelle siamo riunite. Potrebbe essere difficile per me. ... Si è dimenticata?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "...That's right. The Seven Sisters were really lively when they got together. ...But with Ange's magical power now, I think summoning just Mammon is the best we can hope for. The stakes for the other six have been lost."
Umineko Project (UP): "......Yeah. The Seven Sisters {i:were} really lively when they got together. ......But with your magical power now, I think summoning Mammon is the best we can hope for. The stakes for the other six have been lost."
PC Japanese (JP): 「……そうだね。七姉妹は、みんなが揃うと本当に賑やかだったもんね。……でも、今の縁寿の魔力じゃ、マモンを呼び出すのが精一杯だと思う。他の６人の杭も紛失してる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「……そうだね。七姉妹は、みんなが揃うと本当に賑やかだったもんね。……でも、今の縁寿の魔力じゃ、マモンを呼び出すのが精一杯だと思う。他の６人の杭も紛失してる」
Russian (RU): "......И то верно. Семь сестёр становились оживлёнными, когда собирались вместе. ......Но с тем уровнем силы, который сейчас имелся у Энджи, призыв Мамоны был лучшим, на что она была способна. Кинжалы же шести остальных были утеряны."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "......Sim. As Sete Irmãs {i:eram} realmente animadas quanto estavam juntas.{n}......Mas com seu poder mágico atual, acredito que invocar Mammon é o máximo que podemos esperar de você. As estacas das outras seis foram perdidas."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「……是呢。七姐妹一旦全員到齊，就真的會很熱鬧呢。……不過真里亞覺得，以現在的緣壽的魔力，召喚馬蒙就已經到極限了。而且，其他六樁都已不知去向。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「……是呢。七姐妹一旦全员到齐，就真的会很热闹呢。……不过真里亚觉得，以现在的缘寿的魔力，召唤马蒙就已经到极限了。而且，其他六桩都已不知去向。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Esatto. Le Sette Sorelle erano davvero vivaci quando stavano assieme. {n}Ma ora con il potere magico di Ange, penso che evocare Mammon sia la cosa migliore che possiamo sperare. I pugnali delle altre sei sono stati perduti."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "My apologies, Lady {f:5:Maria}, but maybe it would be possible to summon the Seven Sisters via my own stake. ...If I am to be used, I'd hope Ange-sama has at least that much power, right...?"
Umineko Project (UP): "My apologies, Lady {f:5:Maria}, but I believe it may not be impossible to summon the Seven Sisters via my own stake. ......If Ange‐sama is to employ me, I would hope that she has at least that much power......?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「恐れながらマリア卿。私の杭を経由し、七姉妹に語りかけ呼び出すことは不可能ではないかと。……私を使役されるのでしたら、その程度の力は、縁寿さまにはお持ちいただきたいところですが……？」
Russian (RU): "Прошу прощения, Леди {f:5:Мария}, но у меня есть вопрос: возможно ли призвать остальных сестёр через мой кинжал? ......Если уж меня берут на работу, то я надеюсь, что у Энджи‐сама хватит сил хотя бы на это, понимаете?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Minhas desculpas, Lady {f:5:Maria}, mas eu acredito que não seja impossível invocar as Sete Irmãs a partir da minha própria estaca. ......Se Ange‐sama está me empregando, eu espero ao mesmo que ela tenha poder suficiente......?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「恕我冒昧。經由我之樁，去與姐妹們取得聯繫，召喚出她們並非不可能。……既然要使役我，這點程度的魔力，緣壽小姐還是得有的吧……？」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「恕我冒昧。经由我之桩，去与姐妹们取得联系，召唤出她们并非不可能。……既然要使役我，这点程度的魔力，缘寿小姐还是得有的吧……？」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Le mie scuse, Lady MARIA, ma mi chiedo se non sia impossibile evocare le Sette Sorelle attraverso il mio stesso pugnale. ... Se devo essere usata, vorrei sperare che Ange-sama abbia almeno quel poco di potere, capisce...?"

Umineko Project (UP): I see. Unable to be satisfied with being summoned alone, she asks for the other sisters to be summoned as well.
PC Japanese (JP): なるほど。自分だけが呼び出されただけでは満足できず、他の姉妹の召喚までも願うわけか。
Russian (RU): Ясно. Поскольку ей мало быть призванной одной, она просит призвать и остальных сестёр.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entendo. Incapaz de se satisfazer sendo invocada sozinha, ela pediu para invocar também as outras irmãs.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 原來如此。她是並不滿足於只有自己被召喚出來，在請求我去召喚出其他姐妹麼？
Chinese Simplified (CN): 原来如此。她是并不满足于只有自己被召唤出来，在请求我去召唤出其他姐妹么？
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Capisco. Dato che non riesce ad essere soddisfatta ad essere evocata da sola, sta chiedendo che siano evocate anche le altre sorelle.

Steam (ST): ...I get it, greed. Yes, she was like this back then, wasn't she...?
Umineko Project (UP): ...I get it—greed. Yes, she was like this back then, wasn't she......
PC Japanese (JP): …なるほど、強欲だ。そう、確かに彼女はそうだったっけ……。
Russian (RU): ...Вот она, жадность. Да, она ведь была такой и в прошлом, не так ли?
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Entendo — é a ganância. Sim, ela não mudou nada, não é mesmo......?
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …原來如此，好貪婪。對了，她的確就是這種人呢……。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …原来如此，好贪婪。对了，她的确就是这种人呢……。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Capisco, avidità. Sì, lei era così tempo fa, non è vero...

Steam (ST): ......To furniture, the times during which they are used are bliss. No matter how badly they are exploited, being used is furniture's joy.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Bliss for furniture is when it is used. Being used, no matter how roughly, is furniture's joy.
PC Japanese (JP): ………家具にとって、使役される時こそが至福。どんなに酷使されようとも、使役されることは家具の喜びなのだ。
Russian (RU): .........Для мебели блаженным является то время, когда ею пользуются. Как бы нещадно их не эксплуатировали, для мебели радость, когда её используют.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........A felicidade de uma mobília é ser usada. Ser usada, não importando o quão bruscamente, é a alegria de uma mobília.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………對家具來說，受使役即是他們的至福。不管如何地被如牛馬般使喚，受使役都是家具的喜悅。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………对家具来说，受使役即是他们的至福。不管如何地被如牛马般使唤，受使役都是家具的喜悦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Per i mobili, il tempo in cui sono usati è la felicità perfetta. Non importa quanto male vengano usati, essere usato è la gioia di un mobile.

Steam (ST): On the contrary, regardless of how nice you are to them, not being given a job is more painful than anything in their eyes.
Umineko Project (UP): Not only that, but no matter how much care you might treat them with, if they are not given a job, that would give them the greatest anguish.
PC Japanese (JP): むしろ逆に、どんなに丁寧であろうとも、仕事を与えられないことの方が、彼女らには苦痛。
Russian (RU): В общем, как бы вы ни пытались смягчить эти слова, не давать им работу — всё равно что причинять им боль.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Não apenas isso, mas não importa o quanto você cuide, se não der um trabalho a elas, isso as trará a maior das angústia.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不如說，不論有多麼禮貌親切，不能給她們工作，就是她們的痛苦。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不如说，不论有多么礼貌亲切，不能给她们工作，就是她们的痛苦。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Non solo quello, ma non importa quanto potresti dirla gentilmente, non ricevere alcun compito sarebbe più doloroso per loro.

Steam (ST): Mammon spoke in a challenging way, but she wanted me to summon the other sisters somehow and rescue them from the world of nothingness.
Umineko Project (UP): Mammon spoke as though to provoke me, but what she wanted was for me to summon the other sisters somehow and rescue them from the world of nothingness.
PC Japanese (JP): マモンは、挑発するような口ぶりでいるが、他の姉妹を何とか呼び出し、虚無の世界から救ってやりたいと思っているのだ。
Russian (RU): Своими словами Мамона словно пыталась провоцировать меня, но на деле она хотела, чтобы я как‐нибудь призвала остальных сестёр и спасла их из небытия.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mammon falou como se quisesse me provocar, mas o que ela queria era que eu invocasse as outras irmãs de alguma forma e as resgatasse do mundo do nada.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 馬蒙雖在以挑釁般的口吻說話，但她是想設法讓其他姐妹也被召喚出來，將她們救出虛無的世界。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 马蒙虽在以挑衅般的口吻说话，但她是想设法让其他姐妹也被召唤出来，将她们救出虚无的世界。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Mammon parlò come per provocarmi, ma lei voleva farmi evocare le altre sorelle in qualche modo e liberarle dal mondo del nulla.

Steam (ST): ......If that's the case, all she's gotta do is say so. These demon people can never just say what they mean.
Umineko Project (UP): .........Why not just be honest and ask me to, then?{n}Demons really are difficult.
PC Japanese (JP): ………なら、素直にそうして下さいと言えりゃいいのに。悪魔って連中は本当に素直じゃない。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ………なら、素直にそうして下さいと言えりゃいいのに。{n}悪魔って連中は本当に素直じゃない。
Russian (RU): .........В таком случае от неё требуется лишь честно попросить меня.{n}До чего же трудно демонам быть честными.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): .........Então por que ela não pode ser honesta e pedir isso?{n}Demônios são mesmo complicados.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ………那麼，直說請我幫忙不就行了？{n}惡魔真是幫不老實的傢伙呢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ………那么，直说请我帮忙不就行了？{n}恶魔真是帮不老实的家伙呢。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... In quel caso, tutto quello che deve farlo è ammetterlo onestamente. {n}Questi demoni non sono affatto onesti.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "......Ange, don't overdo it. You'll need plenty of rehabilitation just from summoning Mammon."
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Ange. Don't overdo it. Just being able to summon Mammon is more than enough rehabilitation."
PC Japanese (JP): 「………縁寿。無理しないで。マモンを呼び出せただけで、リハビリには十分だよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………縁寿。無理しないで。マモンを呼び出せただけで、リハビリには十分だよ」
Russian (RU): ".........Энджи. Не перестарайся. Тебе нужно как следует отдохнуть после призыва Мамоны."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Ange. Não exagere. Apenas ser capaz de invocar a Mammon é mais do que o bastante para a sua reabilitação."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………緣壽。不要勉強。光是能召喚出馬蒙，就已經恢復充分了喲。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………缘寿。不要勉强。光是能召唤出马蒙，就已经恢复充分了哟。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "... Ange. Non strafare. Avrai bisogno di sufficiente riposo solo per aver evocato Mammon."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "Oh, I'll need to rehabilitate after just one? Well, I'm just killing time anyway. ......Okay, Mammon. I've gone this far. I'll call as many as I can."
Umineko Project (UP): "Oh, I'm rehabilitated after just one? I'm just killing time anyway. .........Alright, Mammon. In for a penny, in for a pound. I'll call as many as I can for you."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あら、１人だけでリハビリになっちゃうの？　どうせ暇潰しよ。………いいわ、マモン。乗りかかった船だわ。呼べるところまで呼んであげる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あら、１人だけでリハビリになっちゃうの？　どうせ暇潰しよ。………いいわ、マモン。乗りかかった船だわ。呼べるところまで呼んであげる」
Russian (RU): "О, так мне нужен отдых после призыва всего лишь одной? Что ж, я ведь так и так убиваю время. .........Ладно, Мамона. Я так и так уже разогрелась. Призову стольких, скольких смогу."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Oh, eu estou reabilitada após invocar apenas uma? De qualquer forma, só estou matando tempo. .........Certo, Mammon. Se começamos, vamos até o fim. Eu irei chamar quantas eu puder."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「啊啦，光一個就恢復了？反正是打發時間。………好吧，馬蒙。一不做，二不休。能召喚出幾個，就給你召喚出幾個。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「啊啦，光一个就恢复了？反正是打发时间。………好吧，马蒙。一不做，二不休。能召唤出几个，就给你召唤出几个。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Oh, devo riposarmi solo dopo una? Beh, in ogni caso sto solo ammazzando il tempo. ... D'accordo, Mammon. Mi sono già scaldata. Ne chiamerò più che posso."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Really...?! Not bad, Ange-sama! Okay, quickly, quickly!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Really......?! Niiice, Ange‐sama! Alright, go go go!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「本当に……？！さっすが縁寿さまぁ！　さぁさ、早くっ、早くっ！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「本当に……？！　さっすが縁寿さまぁ！　さぁさ、早くっ、早くっ！」
Russian (RU): "Правда?! Неплохо Энджи‐сама! Хорошо, скорее, скорее!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mesmo......?! Como esperado da Ange‐sama! Vamos, rápido, rápido!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「真的……？！不愧是緣壽小姐！來——來，快、快！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「真的……？！不愧是缘寿小姐！来——来，快、快！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Davvero...?! Niente male, Ange-sama! D'accordo, svelta, svelta!"

Steam (ST): Apparently, even though she'd asked, Mammon hadn't really expected Ange to do this.
Umineko Project (UP): Even though she had said it, it seemed that Mammon hadn't really expected to be able to ask this of Ange.
PC Japanese (JP): マモンは、言ってはみたものの、本当に頼めるとは思ってなかったらしい。
Russian (RU): Похоже, что несмотря на сказанные ею ранее слова, Мамона не ожидала, что Энджи даст согласие.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mesmo dizendo isso, parecia que Mammon não estava realmente esperando ser capaz de pedir isso a Ange.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看來馬蒙雖然說了這話，但內心中並沒有想到真的可以去拜託緣壽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看来马蒙虽然说了这话，但内心中并没有想到真的可以去拜托缘寿。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Sembrava che anche se l'aveva detto, Mammon non si aspettasse davvero che Ange lo facesse.

Steam (ST): She hopped around, badgering Ange to summon the other sisters.
Umineko Project (UP): She hopped around, badgering Ange to summon the other sisters.
PC Japanese (JP): ぴょんぴょん飛び跳ねながら、縁寿に他の姉妹たちの召喚をせがむ。
Russian (RU): Теперь она прыгала вокруг Энджи, выклянчивая призвать остальных сестёр.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela estava pulando de um lado ao outro, incomodando Ange para invocar as outras irmãs.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 她一邊蹦蹦跳跳，一邊纏著緣壽快去召喚其他姐妹。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 她一边蹦蹦跳跳，一边缠着缘寿快去召唤其他姐妹。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Saltò in giro, tormentando Ange per far evocare le altre sorelle.

Steam (ST): ...Summoning Mammon alone consumed a considerable amount of physical and magical power. ...It'll probably be pretty tough to do six more.
Umineko Project (UP): ......The consumption of physical and magical power used to call Mammon alone was considerable.{n}...It will probably be pretty tough to do six more.
PC Japanese (JP): ……マモンを呼ぶだけで、体力と魔力の消耗は著しい。…さらに６人は、かなり難しいだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): ……マモンを呼ぶだけで、体力と魔力の消耗は著しい。{n}…さらに６人は、かなり難しいだろう。
Russian (RU): ......Призыв одной только Мамоны затребовал колоссальных затрат физических и магических сил.{n}...Призыв остальных шести будет как пить дать тяжёлой задачей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O consumo de poder físico e mágico usado para chamar apenas Mammon já era considerável.{n}...Provavelmente seria bem difícil chamar mais seis.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……光是召喚馬蒙就消耗了大量的體力與魔力。{n}…再去召喚六個恐怕十分艱難吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……光是召唤马蒙就消耗了大量的体力与魔力。{n}…再去召唤六个恐怕十分艰难吧。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Il consumo di potere magico e fisico usato per chiamare anche solo Mammon era considerevole. ... Probabilmente sarà piuttosto dura evocarne altre sei.

Steam (ST): ...I'm awed by the magical power of those who can summon sisters like this at will with a snap of their fingers...and who therefore reach the level where they can be called witches.
Umineko Project (UP): ......I'm in awe of the magical power of those who reach the level of being called witches, because those people can summon these sisters with no more than a snap of their fingers.
PC Japanese (JP): ……こんな姉妹を、指一つ鳴らすだけで自在に呼び出せるのだから、魔女と呼ばれる域の連中の魔力は恐れ入る。
Russian (RU): ......Я трепещу перед магической силой тех, кто способен призвать сестёр всего лишь щелчком пальцев, и которые достигли уровня, на которым их можно назвать ведьмами.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Estou apavorada com o poder mágico daqueles que chegam ao nível de serem chamados de bruxas, porque essas pessoas podem invocar essas irmãs fazendo não mais do que um simples estalar de dedos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……正是因為到達魔女領域的那些人僅靠打個響指就能隨心所欲地召喚出這幫姐妹，所以他們的魔力才令人生畏。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……正是因为到达魔女领域的那些人仅靠打个响指就能随心所欲地召唤出这帮姐妹，所以他们的魔力才令人生畏。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Sono in soggezione del potere magico di coloro che possono evocare le sorelle così a comando con uno schiocco di dita, e di chi per di più raggiunge il livello in cui possono essere chiamati streghe.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "Mammon, don't make Ange overdo it. She still isn't at her best..."
Umineko Project (UP): "Mammon, don't make Ange overdo it. She still isn't back to form yet..."
PC Japanese (JP): 「マモン、縁寿に無理をさせないで。縁寿はまだ本調子じゃないから…。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「マモン、縁寿に無理をさせないで。縁寿はまだ本調子じゃないから…」
Russian (RU): "Мамона, не вынуждай Энджи перегибать палку. Энджи всё ещё не удалось вернуться в прежнее состояние..."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Mammon, não faça com que a Ange se esgote. Ela ainda não voltou a ser como era..."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「馬蒙，不要勉強緣壽。緣壽還沒有恢復到正常狀態…」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「马蒙，不要勉强缘寿。缘寿还没有恢复到正常状态…」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Mammon, spingere Ange a strafare. Ange non è ancora nelle sue normali condizioni..."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "Whaaat?! Ange-sama said she'd summon everyone!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Whaaaa?! Ange‐sama said that she'd summon everyone!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「えぇー？！　縁寿さまはみんなを召喚してくれるって言いましたぁ！」
Russian (RU): "Ась?! Она же сказала, что призовёт всех!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ehhhhh?! A Ange‐sama disse que vai invocar todas!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「哎哎——？！緣壽小姐說了，會幫我召喚出大家的啊！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「哎哎——？！缘寿小姐说了，会帮我召唤出大家的啊！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Hu-h?! Ange-sama ha detto che avrebbe evocato tutti!"

Steam (ST): Actually, I only said I'd call as many as I could. ...I guess that's greed for you.
Umineko Project (UP): Actually, I only said that I'd call as many as I could.{n}......Guess this is greed.
PC Japanese (JP): 呼べるところまで呼ぶとしか言ってないのに。……やっぱり強欲ね。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 呼べるところまで呼ぶとしか言ってないのに。{n}……やっぱり強欲ね。
Russian (RU): Вообще‐то я сказала, что призову стольких, скольких смогу.{n}......Вот она, жадность.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Na verdade, eu disse que iria chamar quantas eu pudesse.{n}......Acho que isso é a ganância.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 我明明只說了，能召喚出幾個，就召喚出幾個。{n}……果然好貪婪呢。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 我明明只说了，能召唤出几个，就召唤出几个。{n}……果然好贪婪呢。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): In realtà, ho solo detto che ne avrei chiamate più che potevo. ... Credo che questa sia l'avidità.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Steam (ST): "Don't overdo it, Ange. You should rest for today. You're tired enough."
Umineko Project (UP): "Don't overdo it, Ange. You should rest for today. You're tired enough."
PC Japanese (JP): 「無理しないで、縁寿。もう今日は休んだ方がいい。君は十分疲れてるよ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「無理しないで、縁寿。もう今日は休んだ方がいい。君は十分疲れてるよ」
Russian (RU): "Не перестарайся, Энджи. Лучше передохни. Ты слишком устала."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Não se esforce demais, Ange. Você deveria descansar por hoje. Já está cansada demais."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「別勉強，緣壽。今天還是先去休息吧。你已經相當累了哦。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「别勉强，缘寿。今天还是先去休息吧。你已经相当累了哦。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Non strafare, Ange. Dovresti riposarti per oggi. Sei sufficientemente stanca."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Ange
Steam (ST): "It's okay. I'm just killing time anyway. Let me get tired enough that I can just fall over asleep."
Umineko Project (UP): "It's alright. I'm just killing time anyway. Let me get tired enough so I can just keel over."
PC Japanese (JP): 「いいわよ。どうせ暇潰し。ばったり寝込めるくらいに疲れさせてもらうわ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「いいわよ。どうせ暇潰し。ばったり寝込めるくらいに疲れさせてもらうわ」
Russian (RU): "Всё путём. Я ведь всё равно убиваю время. Дайте мне устать настолько, чтобы провалиться в сон."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Está tudo bem. Eu só estou matando tempo mesmo. Me deixe ficar cansado a ponto de só conseguir ficar de joelhos."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「沒關係。反正是打發時間。就讓我累到一倒頭就能睡著吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「没关系。反正是打发时间。就让我累到一倒头就能睡着吧。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): " È tutto a posto. In ogni caso sto solo ammazzando il tempo. Fammi stancare abbastanza da farmi cadere addormentata."

Steam (ST): ...This time, there's no vessel.
Umineko Project (UP): ......This time there's no vessel.
PC Japanese (JP): ……今度は依り代はない。
Russian (RU): ......На этот раз сосуда нет.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Dessa vez não há um receptáculo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……這次沒有依代。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……这次没有依代。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Questa volta non c'è nessun medium.

Steam (ST): I'll have to strengthen the image from my knowledge of the grimoire...and materialize them with just that.
Umineko Project (UP): I'll have to strengthen the image solely from the knowledge in the grimoire, and manifest them just with that.
PC Japanese (JP): 魔導書の知識だけからイメージを強め、それだけで顕現しなくてはならない。
Russian (RU): Мне придётся сделать чётче образ, полученный от знаний из гримуара и материализовать их лишь на этой основе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Vou precisar ter força para imaginar apenas pelo conhecimento do grimório, e as manifestar apenas com isto.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 只能靠魔導書的知識來加強印象，僅憑此來使之顯現。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 只能靠魔导书的知识来加强印象，仅凭此来使之显现。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Dovrò rinforzare l'immagine dalla mia conoscenza del grimorio, e materializzarle solo con quello.

Steam (ST): I held my hands out into the air, replaying in my head the sensation from when I'd summoned Mammon...
Umineko Project (UP): I held my hands out into the air, replaying in my head the sensation from when I had summoned Mammon......
PC Japanese (JP): 虚空に両手をかざし、マモンを呼び出した時の感触を再び頭の中に再現する……。

Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Perché senza dubbi... il poco tempo che ho speso con loro... era divertente, senza alcun dubbio.

Speaker: Satan
Steam (ST): "Satan of Wrath, right here. ......What the hell are you people doing?!! Don't you realize how much it's burdening Ange-sama just to let us have an idle chat?!"
Umineko Project (UP): "Satan the Wrathful, right here. ............What the hell are you people doing!! Do you realize how much it's burdening Ange‐sama just for us to have an idle chat?!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「憤怒のサタン、ここに。…………何やってるのよあんたたちッ！！　私たちが井戸端会議をするだけで、どれだけ縁寿さまに負担を掛けてるかわかってんの？！」
Russian (RU): "Сатана, она же Гнев, на месте. ............Вы что творите?! Вы хоть соображаете, как нагрузили Энджи‐сама, чтобы мы могли просто поболтать?!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Satan, da Ira, está aqui. ............Que merda vocês estão fazendo!!{n}Vocês percebem o quão duro isso é para a Ange‐sama apenas conversar com a gente?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「憤怒的撒旦，在此。…………都在幹什麼呀，你們幾個！！你們明不明白，僅僅是讓我們開個茶話會，就會使緣壽小姐承受多大的負擔？！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「愤怒的撒旦，在此。…………都在干什么呀，你们几个！！你们明不明白，仅仅是让我们开个茶话会，就会使缘寿小姐承受多大的负担？！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Satan dell'Ira, eccomi qui. ... Che diavolo state facendo voi!! Capite quanto è pesante per Ange-sama anche solo farci fare una stupida chiacchierata?!"

Steam (ST): Satan, who had apparently figured out the situation immediately after being summoned, cried out in a loud voice, telling her sisters off.
Umineko Project (UP): Satan, who had apparently figured out the situation immediately after being summoned, yelled out in a loud voice, telling her sisters off.
PC Japanese (JP): 現れてすぐ、状況を察しているらしいサタンが大声を張り上げ、妹たちを叱り飛ばす。
Russian (RU): Сатана, после своего призыва сразу смекнувшая, что происходит, заорала на своих сестёр, охлаждая их пыл.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Satan, que aparentemente percebeu a situação imediatamente após ser invocada, gritou com todas, dizendo as suas irmãs para pararem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 剛一冒出來，就貌似察覺到了狀況的撒旦提高音量，大聲斥責妹妹。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 刚一冒出来，就貌似察觉到了状况的撒旦提高音量，大声斥责妹妹。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): Satan, che evidentemente aveva capito immediatamente la situazione dopo essere stata evocata, gridò a gran voce, sgridando le proprie sorelle.

Steam (ST): ...That loud voice made my consciousness hazy again.
Umineko Project (UP): ......That loud voice made my consciousness fade again.
PC Japanese (JP): ……その大声に私の意識は再び遠退きかける。
Russian (RU): ......От этого голоса я чуть не упала в обморок.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......O grito fez minha consciência desaparecer novamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……她響亮的聲音使我的意識再度遠去。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……她响亮的声音使我的意识再度远去。
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): ... Quella voce così alta fece dissolvere di nuovo la mia coscienza.

Speaker: Satan
Steam (ST): "We are furniture who have been granted rest by {f:5:Beatrice} and whose duty has been finished! Not only are you not honored at being given another chance to be of some use, but you're putting a burden on our new master, you disgrace to all furniture!! Erase yourselves right away!!"
Umineko Project (UP): "We are furniture that has been permitted rest by {f:5:Beatrice}, furniture that has finished its duty! Not content to be graced with the opportunity to once again be of some use, you are putting a burden on your new master—this is a DISGRACE to furniture!! Erase yourselves RIGHT NOW!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「私たちはベアトリーチェさまより休むことを許された、役目を終えた家具なのよ！　再びお役に立てる機会を賜るどころか、新しい主人の負担になるなんて、そんなの家具の名折れッ！！　早く姿を消しなさいッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Мы мебель, которой пожаловала покой {f:5:Беатриче}, и чей долг был исполнен! Вы не только не воспринимаете с почётом дарованную вам возможность вновь послужить, но вдобавок ещё и сверх меры нагружаете нашу новую госпожу, позорная вы мебель! Сейчас же сотритесь!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Nós somos mobílias na qual a {f:5:Beatrice} nos permitiu descansar, mobílias que cumpriram seus deveres! Não contentes em ser agraciadas com a oportunidade de mais uma vez serem úteis, vocês estão depositando um grande fardo em sua nova mestra — isto é uma desgraça para uma mobília!! Apaguem‐se agora mesmo!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「我們是獲貝阿朵莉切夫人准許安眠，已盡完自身職責的家具！不但不滿足於得到再次為主人盡責的機會，還對新主人造成負擔，簡直就是家具之恥！！快給我速速消去身形！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我们是获贝阿朵莉切夫人准许安眠，已尽完自身职责的家具！不但不满足于得到再次为主人尽责的机会，还对新主人造成负担，简直就是家具之耻！！快给我速速消去身形！！」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Siamo mobili a cui è stato consentito il riposo da Beatrice, e il cui dovere è stato compiuto! Non solo non siete onorate di ricevere un'altra possibilità di essere di qualche utilità, ma state caricando un peso sulla nostra nuova padrona, voi disgrazia per i mobili!! Sparite subito!!"

Speaker: Belphegor
Steam (ST): "Yes, it's like Satan-nee says. I'll erase myself. You all erase yourselves too. In this moment, that's the best way for us to be of use to Ange-sama."
Umineko Project (UP): "Yes, it's like Satan‐nee says. I'll erase myself. And you all vanish too. In this moment, that is the best way for us to be of use to Ange‐sama."
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん、サタン姉の言う通りだ。姿を消す。お前たちも姿を消せ。それがこの瞬間、一番、縁寿さまのお役に立てる。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん、サタン姉の言う通りだ。姿を消す。お前たちも姿を消せ。それがこの瞬間、一番、縁寿さまのお役に立てる」
Russian (RU): "Да, Сатана‐нее дело говорит. Я сотру себя. Вы тоже сотритесь. В данный момент так мы можем помочь Энджи‐саме лучше всего."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim, a Satan‐nee está certa. Irei me apagar. E todas vocês devem desaparecer também. Neste momento, esta é a única forma de sermos úteis para a Ange‐sama."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯，撒旦姐姐說得對。我這就消去身形。你們也快消去身形。這是在這一瞬間最能幫到緣壽小姐的事。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯，撒旦姐姐说得对。我这就消去身形。你们也快消去身形。这是在这一瞬间最能帮到缘寿小姐的事。」
Italian (Ars Magica) (Old) (ITA): "Sì, è come dice Satan-nee. Sparirò. Sparite anche tutte voi. In questo momento, questo è il miglior modo per essere di qualche utilità a Ange-sama."

Speaker: Mammon
Steam (ST): "No way. Not until everyone's summoned!"
Umineko Project (UP): "No way. Not until everyone gets summoned!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「私は嫌よ。みんなを呼び出してもらえるまでは嫌！」

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「我不要。在把大家都召唤出来前，不消失！」

Steam (ST): "Same heeere! I'm huuungry! I mean, I'd hate to leave again so soon after being reunited with you all!"
Umineko Project (UP): "No way for me too! I'm hungryyy! I mean—we only just met up again, I don't wanna go back already!"

Speaker: Satan

Umineko Project (UP): "Don't be so selfish!! Come on, hurry up and vanish!! Come on, Asmo! Disappear right now!!"

Chinese Simplified (CN): 「少给我讲些任性的话！！快，给我消失！！快、阿丝磨！快给我消失！！」

Umineko Project (UP): ".........Ahh, they really are lively. ......They never make you.........bored......"
